.. py:function:: _get_default_structure_selection(structure_selection = None, mol = None, atXYZ_source = None, charge_info = None, default_levels = ['atoms', 'bonds'])

   Get a default structure selection object from any accessible data if possible.

   :param structure_selection: A potential already provided structure/feature selection.
                               Alternatively a description of the selection to be applied to a dataset as, e.g.,
                               with a SMARTS selection, a selection of indices to consider, etc. Defaults to None.
                               If provided, will be returned back.
   :type structure_selection: StructureSelection | StructureSelectionDescriptor | None, optional
   :param mol: An optional instance of an RDKit molecule. Used to construct a StructureSelection instance if `structure_selection` is None. Defaults to None.
   :type mol: rc.Mol | None, optional
   :param atXYZ: An xr.DataArray holding positional data of a molecule or a different source for the positional data. Only the first frame will be used to create a default mol if `structure_selection` and `mol` were not provided. Defaults to None.
   :type atXYZ: xr.Dataset | xr.DataArray | ShnitselDataset | None, optional
   :param default_levels: the desired default levels included in the selection that may be recreated if none was provided. Defaults to 'atoms' and 'bonds'.
   :type default_levels: Sequence[FeatureLevelOptions], optional

   :raises ValueError: Not enough data provided to construct a default selection from.

   :returns: The initialized default structure selection.
   :rtype: StructureSelection


.. py:function:: _get_default_state_selection(state_selection = None, state_source = None)

   Get a default state selection object from any accessible data if possible.

   :param state_selection: A potential already provided state selection.
                           Alternatively a description of the selection to be applied to a dataset as, e.g.,
                           with a description of state types selection, a selection of indices to consider, etc. Defaults to None.
                           If provided, will be returned back.
   :type state_selection: StateSelection | StateSelectionDescriptor | None, optional
   :param state_source: An xr.DataArray or a kind of dataset that may hold state information of a system. Defaults to None.
   :type state_source: xr.Dataset | xr.DataArray | ShnitselDataset | None, optional

   :raises ValueError: Not enough data provided to construct a default selection from.

   :returns: The initialized default structure selection.
   :rtype: StateSelection
